name: Slingo (itch)
description:
Click and hold to swing around a point, let go to swing around a different point.

Collect the small dots to get a small time bonus, and the green dot to continue to the next round. Some ways to get extra points

  • Holding down the mouse and grappling gives you less points than not grappling, try aim your swings well.
  • Even the time bonuses give you points.
  • Most of your points will come from the green squares.

Made by @5mixer and Gas1312 :D

Thanks for playing.
